誺字的基本解释

誺
chī
不知。

誺
lài
误。

誺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chī］
［《廣韻》丑知切，平支，徹。］
(1)不知道。
(2)互相用话诋毁。
[②]［lài］
［《廣韻》洛代切，去代，來。］
谬误。

誺字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誺； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1166第01
【廣韻】丑知切【集韻】抽知切，?音螭。【揚子·方言】不知也。沅灃之閒，凡相問而不知答曰誺。　又【正字通】以言相欺曰謾，以言相誣曰誺。　又【梵書】空谷傳聲曰赤謾白誺。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?丑吏切，音貽。義同。　又【玉篇】力代切【廣韻】落代切【集韻】洛代切，?音賚。【廣雅】誤也。　【類篇】或作䜉??。

誺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
誺字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誺; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1166 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Ugly knowing and cutting [Ji Yun] Picking and knowing and cutting,? Yin Chi. 【Yangtze Dialect】I don’t know. In the leisure of Yuanfeng, everyone who asks questions without knowing the answer is epiphysis.　[Zhengzitong] Use words to deceive each other to say humiliation, and use words to falsely refer to it as epiphysis.　[Sanskrit Book] Konggu said with a voice, saying that it is red and white.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ugly staff cut, Yin Yi. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Li Daiqie [Guangyun] Luo Daiqie [Jiyun] Luo Daiqie,? Yin Lai. [Guang Ya] Mistake.　[Classes] or as a ??.
